name: Jester Street: Card Counting Trainer
storyline:
Take control of the Game: Pause, Resume, see all Previous Cards, their Card Count Value, the Running & True Count; all in order to 'keep the count' -providing an advantage to the Player (when to bet BIG!).

The game of Blackjack will consist of (various) amounts of Decks, & knowing the current Running Count will enable you to calculate these best strategic betting points. See Utilities below for more info.
summary:
Welcome to Jester Street, England. Hidden from sight, a small laundrette holds a large secret... A unique, sophisticated card-counting machine, intended to help tip the balance back into the 'common' Player's odds.

Avid Player's drop in to test and perfect their Blackjack (card counting): timings, count(s), and amounts. Locals get priority access! 'Come try your skills....

videos.title: Jester Street : Card Counting Trainer (Coming Soon to Steam)
